00049 typedef Meta::list<RangeServerPolicy, DfsClientPolicy, HyperspaceClientPolicy,
00050         MasterClientPolicy, DefaultServerPolicy> Policies;

00052 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00053 
00054   ReactorRunner::ms_record_arrival_clocks = true;
00055 
00056   try {
00057     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00058 
00059     Global::verbose = get_bool("verbose");
00060 
00061     if (has("induce-failure")) {
00062       if (Global::failure_inducer == 0)
00063         Global::failure_inducer = new FailureInducer();
00064 
00065       Global::failure_inducer->parse_option(get_str("induce-failure"));
00066     }
00067 
00068     Comm *comm = Comm::instance();
00069     ConnectionManagerPtr conn_manager= new ConnectionManager(comm);
00070 
00071     int worker_count = get_i32("Hypertable.RangeServer.Workers");
00072     ApplicationQueuePtr app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(worker_count);
00073 
00077     Global::hyperspace_ptr = new Hyperspace::Session(comm, properties,
00078         new HyperspaceSessionHandler());
00079     int timeout = get_i32("Hyperspace.Timeout");
00080 
00081     if (!Global::hyperspace_ptr->wait_for_connection(timeout)) {
00082       HT_ERROR("Unable to connect to hyperspace, exiting...");
00083       exit(1);
00084     }
00085 
00086     RangeServerPtr range_server= new RangeServer(properties,
00087         conn_manager, app_queue, Global::hyperspace_ptr);
00088 
00089     // install maintenance timer
00090     TimerHandlerPtr timer_handler = new TimerHandler(comm, range_server.get());
00091 
00092     app_queue->join();
00093 
00094     HT_ERROR("Exiting RangeServer.");
00095   }
00096   catch (Exception &e) {
00097     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00098     return 1;
00099   }
00100   return 0;
00101 }
